Question
========

Two *random samples* are drawn from a population, one with size 40 and one with size 160. Compared to the sample of 40 observations, the *standard error* of the mean in the sample of 160 observations

Answerlist
----------

* Twice as small.
* Four times as small.
* About the same size.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Twice as small...: Correct
* Four times as small...: Incorrect
* About the same size...: Incorrect
